name: Lord of the Sea
description:
game introduction
"Lord of the Sea" is a European-style sailing adventure game. The game has a well-designed plot, unexpected treasures at sea, pirate ships coming to plunder, and monster BOSS in the depths of the ocean. Most of the levels in the game require players to combine hands and brains to challenge your business ability and operation.

Game features

⚪The battle system of "Lord of the Seas" is to find coins in the ocean, load shells for one's own ships, to defend against foreign pirate ships, to obtain more money to improve their strength.

⚪ The trade function is a very important feature. If you can trade well, you will get more resources, and you will increase your strength faster in order to defeat other pirate ships.

⚪ Give full play to your abilities: the better you perform, the stronger you can become. When you defeat an enemy, you will get their treasures. When you have enough strength, you can go to the depths of the ocean to challenge the sea monsters.
